article_title: Aiken makes nonpartisanship appeal in attempt to win Congressional seat
article_text: Democrat Clay Aiken faces tough conditions in his race to unseat Republican incumbent US Rep. Renee Ellmers in the conservative 2nd Congressional District for North Carolina.
